item.title: RubyConf 2007 - Day 2 - "The Ruby VM Smackdown Begins"
item.description: As the sun rose over the hills of North Carolina, the quiet betrayed a seething fire blazing in the hearts of three development teams. “Three teams enter, one team leaves!” Yes, I am talking about the main event, people, the one, the only, Ruby VM Smackdown! The room was jam packed, the anticipation was high. As good fortune would have it, I was sitting right next to the head of the team who was my personal favorite to win the day.
